## Engagement Trend {.section-title}

```{r}
library(plotly)

weeks <- c("Week 1","Week 2","Week 3","Week 4","Week 5")
engagement <- c(62, 68, 71, 75, 78)

plot_ly(
  x = weeks,
  y = engagement,
  type = "scatter",
  mode = "lines+markers",
  hovertemplate = "%{x}<br>Engagement: %{y}%<extra></extra>"
) %>%
  layout(
    yaxis = list(title = "Engagement (%)", range = c(0,100)),
    xaxis = list(title = ""),
    margin = list(t = 40)
  )
